name: Food Melody: "Indonesian Edition"
description:
Food Melody Indonesian Edition is an Indonesian rhythm game about a kid who runs about the streets collecting local foods from the local vendors to study.

Each level consists of basic rhythm game mechanics, but after a few successful combos, a Food Combo frenzy will turn on and you will be able to collect the foods required to fill the Foodictionary, a small dictionary explaining the various traditional foods in Indonesia

Controls: D-F-J-K

Made with Unity by:
-Thomas Farelino (Game Designer + Audio)
-Farhan Ramadhani Irsyad (Programmer)
-Anugrah Dwi Hartanto (Visual Artist)
-Ziva Hanifa (Visual Artist)
-Morisco (Visual Artist)
